column4: I want Azureus to launch of start-up - I went to sessions-->Startup-->Add  but were would I browse to, or what command do I need to use to launch it
were does ubuntu install programs,  where is the programs folder ?
What are you looking for exactly?
If anything is causing the problem, I'd say it is BECAUSE you are going across the network. Copy the ISO to a local location, if you can.
